title: Whats happening with OCE right now?
body: Why is OCE down first of all i got a que which kept going up but now its straight up just not working. its happening with all my friends as well?

replies.body:
Hey there,

There are currently known issues with the login and game servers that are being looked into, see the pinned thread in this forum for more information.

And we're live.

See you on the rift.
